comments:
java.lang.NullPointerException when creating a log correlation.

When right-clicking the Log Correlation folder in the Log Navigator pane of the 
Log View after creating a log correlation using the Hyades v3.3 
(20050214_1001), the following exception is thrown in the .log file:

It is a regression introduced during refactoring (an array pointer was not 
checked)

This fix did not make it into the Hyades 3.0.2 driver which is required for 
consuming products.  The following exception was thrown when using the Hyades 
3.0.2 build 20050225_1641:

Can you please take a look at this Alex?
This is not the same problem than the one fixed by Sebastien, as you can see in 
the two different logs.
Note that first problem was not existing in 3.0.2.
Assigning to ID for Hyades 3.0.2 readme entry.

Alex cannot reproduce this bug in the latest 3.0.2 driver. If you can reproduce 
it in TPTP, please feel free to open. Since it can't be reproduced, it will not 
be readmed.

After talking to Alex, this appears to be a different problem.  It appears to 
be somehow related to the original problem since the API that throws the NPE 
iterates a collection which is either null or contains a null element.  
Although the stack trace is this defect was caused by selecting a correlation 
using the Hyades v3.0.2 driver, Alex and I could not reproduce the problem.
